title: Token Distribution Schedule: Ratification
body:
After a successful launch and initial distribution of the $VROOM token (150k/10m tokens distributed equally to 8 founding members), trunzo.eth moved the balance of tokens (8.8m) to the vrooomDAO multisig wallet (0xE74c20fBDd7607361eCc88277f168886Db55645F).

The below schedule contemplates the complete macro-level tokenomics of $VROOM.

- Total $VROOM: 10,000,000
- Total $VROOM Needed to Join Discord: 1000
- Airdrops: 20%
	- Airdrop 1: 12% to original 8 members (1.2m - 150k each)
	- Airdrop 2: 3% to next 8, each a personal invite from a founding member (300k - 37,500 each)
	- Airdrop 3: 2% to next 100, each voted upon through a yet-to-be-defined application process hosted by the founding members plus their 8 invites (200k = 2000 each)
- Uniswap Liquidity: 13% (1.3m)
- Partnerships & Marketing: 10% (1m)
- Treasury: 60% (6m)

The above proposal is influenced by emerging social token / DAO best practices (FWB, Bankless etc.): it rewards the founding team, its meticulously considered invitees and extended network for their contribution in bringing value to the DAO and the $VROOM token while leaving enough $VROOM in the treasury for liquidity, marketing and future initiatives.
author: 0x7b78F347cc40F15344EDE278EcEC4E39E1F15485
